io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.authenticator.impl

Class SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.authenticator.impl.SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISmintIoAuthenticator

    public class SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISmintIoAuthenticator
    Authenticator to refresh access token (=authorization) with Smint.io API.

    General authenticator uses the refresh token to renew the validity of the access token. See article Refreshing an access token for some explanation, how refreshing the access token is performed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT
      The URL to the Smint.ip API OAuth token end point that is used to refresh the OAuth access token.

    • Field Detail

      • OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT

        public static final java.lang.String OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT
        The URL to the Smint.ip API OAuth token end point that is used to refresh the OAuth access token.

        the placeholder {0} is replaced with the tenant ID, fetched from ISettingsModel#getTenantId(). MessageFormat.format(String, Object...) is used to fill the placeholder. 

          OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT = "https://{0}.smint.io/connect/token"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl

        @Inject
public SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl(javax.inject.Provider<okhttp3.OkHttpClient> httpClientProvider)

    • Method Detail

      • refreshSmintIoToken

        public SmintIoAuthenticatorImpl refreshSmintIoToken(ISettingsModel settings,
                                                    IAuthTokenStorage authTokenStorage)
                                             throws SmintIoAuthenticatorException
        Description copied from interface: ISmintIoAuthenticator
        Renew the validity of the OAuth access token utilizing the refresh token.
        Specified by:
        refreshSmintIoToken in interface ISmintIoAuthenticator
        Parameters:
        settings - The settings that contains the OAuth redirection URL and other invariant configuration data that might be necessary.
        authTokenStorage - a storage provider to read the current OAuth access token and refresh token and then make new tokens persistent for next use.
        Returns:
        this for Fluent Interface design.
        Throws:
        SmintIoAuthenticatorException - in case no refresh token is available, invalid, has expired or the Smint.io API rejected the refresh token.
